) on weekdays and one on Sundays. All flights are handeld by NextJet

.

During the summer months it is possible to travel by train on

which passes by Sveg. These tourist trains are slow but passes through wonderful scenery on their way.

Sveg is also served by regular but not frequent bus service.  At least in the winter, the nearest service by train is Ljusdal.
Sveg is generally small enough to walk around.  Rental cars can be had at Rent in Sveg AB.
There seems to quite a lot of boating and
opportunities in the surrounding area, and quite a lot of
.  Thoose interested in history may want to check out the church and cemetery, as well as the Gammelgarden Museum.  Nearby in Ostersund is the remarkable Jamtli Museum.
Respectable food is served at the Myskoxen which is located near the center of town.  Groceries can be had at the Konsum.
Alcohol is served at the Myskoxen, and one or two other places.
Accommodations can be had at the Myskoxen and at the Lilla Hotellet.
